name: Our Crazy Deals
tag_list: gardening, agriculture, greenhouses, greenhouse, hydroponics, hydroponic, hydroponics-gardening, hydroponics-equipment, garden-tools, gardening-tools, garden-containers, greenhouse-kits, outdoor-structures, green-buildings, green-business, green, home-and
overview:
Our Crazy Deals is a part of the family owned company Segura Trading LLC, the company was founded, in 2000, with a mission to provide high quality products and services to our customers.

We sell a full line of Outdoor Hobby Greenhouses of every brand, style, and price range, also a wide selection of Compost Gardening Equipment, Hydroponics Growing Systems, Garden Containers, Lawn and Patio Supplies, Hunting and Sporting Boots, and other Gardening Products.

The majority of the products we sell are stored in our two warehouses located in Youngsville, LA United States 70508.
